activities.address: Trafalgar Square, London WC2N 5DN, United Kingdom
activities.description: A vibrant public square in the heart of London, known for Nelson's Column, fountains, and historical significance. A great place to people-watch and soak in the city's atmosphere.
activities.name: Trafalgar Square

activities.address: Trafalgar Square, London WC2N 5DN, United Kingdom
activities.description: Home to one of the world’s greatest collections of Western European paintings. From Van Gogh’s Sunflowers to Monet’s Water Lilies, the National Gallery offers a rich and diverse artistic experience.
activities.name: National Gallery

activities.address: Leicester Square, London WC2H 7DE, United Kingdom
activities.description: A pedestrianised square in the West End, known for its cinemas, theatres, and street performers. A bustling hub of entertainment and nightlife.
activities.name: Leicester Square

activities.address: Great Russell Street, London WC1B 3DG, United Kingdom
activities.description: One of the world's largest and most comprehensive museums, with a vast collection of art and artifacts from around the world, including the Rosetta Stone and Egyptian mummies.
activities.name: British Museum

activities.description: A beautiful Royal Park in the heart of London, offering scenic views, walking paths, and a tranquil escape from the city bustle. Famous for its pelicans and diverse birdlife.
activities.name: St. James's Park
